column5: I see this term so much, but when I'm not flinging muskie baits, I'm casting a fly rod. Someone please explain what it is and how and where it's done. Sounds like I'm missing out on something.
Found some info on here for you http://www.tacklewarehouse.com/guides/dropshot.html  Hope it helps
Think of it as fishing with a normal hook/sinker, but then reverse the two so that the sinker is on the bottom, and the hook is about a foot above it
JUst read it Marko......thanks much....can't wait to try it.
go to utube type in "how to dropshot" lots of videos showing you how.
